text: Teddy Seidenfeld is an American statistician and philosopher currently the H. A. Simon University Professor at Carnegie Mellon University. Seidenfeld's doctoral students include Jeffrey Helzner, Hailin Liu, and Arthur Paul Pedersen. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Carnegie Mellon University faculty Category:American philosophers
title: Teddy Seidenfeld
